level.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
level.text: This chapter modifies, limits, and supersedes the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 464; 15 U.S.C. § 7001 et seq.), but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101(c) of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7001(c)) or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7003(b)).

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 502 of the Uniform Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction Act.
